title: Slovak tycoon Kocner cleared of murder of journalist and fianc¨¦e

maintext: Kuciak and his fianc¨¦e were shot dead in their house near Bratislava on 21 February 2018, in the first such targeted killing of a journalist in Slovak history. They were both 27.
